title: Token
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: token-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: BC-0096
	- preferred-term:: Token
	- status:: complete
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: A token is a digital asset representation on a blockchain that confers specific rights, utility, or value to its holder, implemented as a cryptographically-secured unit that can be owned, transferred, and programmably controlled through smart contracts according to defined rules and protocols.
	- source:: [[ISO/IEC 23257:2021]]
	- maturity:: mature
	- owl:class:: bc:Token
	- owl:physicality:: VirtualEntity
	- owl:role:: Object
	- owl:inferred-class:: bc:VirtualObject
	- belongsToDomain:: [[TokenEconomicsDomain]]
	- implementedInLayer:: [[EconomicLayer]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: token-relationships
	  collapsed:: true
		- is-subclass-of:: [[Transferable Right]]
		- is-subclass-of:: [[Digital Asset]]
		- is-subclass-of:: [[Blockchain Entity]]

ontology.definition: A token is a digital asset representation on a blockchain that confers specific rights, utility, or value to its holder, implemented as a cryptographically-secured unit that can be owned, transferred, and programmably controlled through smart contracts according to defined rules and protocols.
